meta.description: Optimize the network of a futuristic transportation system to determine the maximum capacity of vehicles that can be dispatched from Hub 0 to Hub 6 per hour.

sets.name: HUBS
sets.description: The strategic hubs in the transportation network.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Maximum number of vehicles that can move between hubs per hour.

objective.name: max_flow_to_hub_6
objective.description: Maximize the flow of vehicles from Hub 0 to Hub 6.

constraints.name: capacity_constraint_0_1
constraints.description: Flow from Hub 0 to Hub 1 does not exceed capacity.
